AI Description: PHG (Population Hybrid Graphs) is a software package for analyzing genome-wide markers in a case-control population hybrid design. It is designed for detecting genomic regions that differ in allele frequency between cases and controls, considering ancestry information and accounting for linkage disequilibrium.
Core Features: Analyze Genome-Wide Markers, Case-Control Population Hybrid Design, Detect Genomic Regions With Different Allele Frequencies, Incorporate Ancestry Information, Account For Linkage Disequilibrium
General Tags: Genomics, Population Genetics, Allele Frequency Analysis, Linkage Disequilibrium, Ancestry Information
